title: U.S.-China tech battle entering its 'primetime' — and generative A.I. could be the next frontier
description: A hallmark of U.S-China tensions in the past few years has been the battle between the two nations for tech supremacy.

title: AWS is investing $100 million in generative A.I. center in race to keep up with Microsoft and Google
description: Amazon's cloud unit wants to show investors that it's committed to generative artificial intelligence after blockbuster announcements from rivals.

title: Moderna files for FDA approval of updated Covid vaccine for fall
description: Moderna said the submission is based on the FDA's recommendation that vaccine makers update their jabs to target omicron subvariant XBB.1.5.

title: Virgin Galactic raises $300 million, seeks another $400 million to expand spacecraft fleet
description: Virgin Galactic's growth hinges on its ability to expand its fleet with Delta-class vehicles. The offerings are a way to stop gap its cash burn until then.

title: Flavored e-cigarette sales are booming despite federal crackdown
description: Disposable e-cigarettes, which have circumvented FDA restrictions, now comprise more than half the vaping market.

title: Retailers Shein and Temu violate U.S. tariff law and evade human rights reviews on imports, House reports says
description: The violations enable the companies to avoid tariffs and human rights reviews on some shipments, lawmakers say.

title: Warren Buffett's charitable giving exceeds $50 billion, more than his entire net worth in 2006
description: Warren Buffett has boosted his total charitable giving to more than $50 billion — greater than his entire net worth in 2006 when he first scheduled the grants.

title: Here’s what we know about Meta’s planned Twitter competitor that has Elon Musk upset
description: The project is reportedly codenamed P92 and may be called Threads.

title: Boycotts rarely work — but anti-LGBTQ+ backlash is forcing companies into tough choices
description: The boycott of Bud Light is having a major effect on its sales, while the wave of anti-LGBTQ+ backlash is also affecting Target and Starbucks.

title: Bud Light boycott is the talk of the town at the prestigious Cannes Lions ad festival
description: Marketers gathered together in southern France this week for the Cannes Lions advertising festival had one topic front of mind: Bud Light's divisive campaign.

title: Watch Fed Chair Jerome Powell speak live to Senate banking panel
description: Powell appears Thursday on Capitol Hill for the second day of his testimony on monetary policy.

title: Bank of England surprises with 50 basis point rate hike to tackle persistent inflation
description: The Bank of England on Thursday surprised markets with a 50 basis point hike to interest rates, its 13th consecutive increase.

title: Turkey's central bank hikes interest rate to 15% in dramatic U-turn to tackle 40% inflation
description: The rate hike is Turkey's first since March 2021.

title: Ocado shares jump more than 40% on speculation of Amazon takeover
description: The report suggests that big technology players could be weighing up their options with regards to Ocado and picks out Amazon as a potentially interested party.

title: Swiss National Bank opts for smaller rate hike, but says more are likely
description: The 25-basis-point rate hike by the SNB is the fifth rise since it began moving rates out of negative territory, though it had opted for 50-basis-point rises.

title: U.S. and India set to announce flurry of deals spanning defense, chips and A.I.
description: Modi and Biden are expected to sign agreements to reduce India's reliance on Russian weapons. Other deals come as the U.S. adopts a "friend-shoring" strategy.

title: Musk picks Vegas for Zuckerberg 'cage match' challenge
description: Twitter owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk seemingly picked Vegas for the location of a "cage match" after being challenged by Facebook co-founder Mark Zuckerberg.

title: China’s new EV subsidies might not be enough to bolster slowing growth
description: One of the few detailed stimulus plans Beijing has announced this year extends tax breaks for electric car purchases, according to documents released Wednesday.

title: Dreaming of life on a remote island? Ireland will pay you almost $100,000 to move to one
description: Ireland wants to entice people to its remote islands and refurbish properties there, promising cash to those who make the move.

title: Vienna is the world's most livable city — again. Here are the other top spots
description: Copenhagen retained its position as the second most livable city in the world, while Australian cities like Sydney and Melbourne broke into the top five.

title: Serving 'lunch' before midnight — and other ways airlines can help reduce jet lag
description: Changes to in-flight lighting, food and sleep schedules can reduce passenger jet lag, according to new research from Qantas and the University of Sydney.

title: Crypto firm Ripple gets in-principle payments license in Singapore
description: Ripple said it received in-principle approval of a Major Payment Institution Licence from the Monetary Authority of Singapore, the country's central bank.

title: Diamond prices have fallen 18% from their peak — and analysts say there's still more room to plunge
description: Diamonds, alongside other jewelry, saw elevated prices during the Covid-19 pandemic which culminated in a peak early last year.
